    • Method Detail

      • makeCall

        @Nullable
public <T> T makeCall(Class<?> targetType,
                      String methodName,
                      Class<T> responseType,
                      Object... methodArgs)
        Description copied from interface: ContextCall
        Makes call to method of service in sibling (Spring) context.
        Specified by:
        makeCall in interface ContextCall
        Parameters:
        targetType - the class of target service; there must be exactly one Spring bean of this type
        methodName - the name of calling method on target service
        methodArgs - the method arguments (if any)
        Returns:
        response from calling (can be null if no response)

      • callTargetMethod

        protected abstract void callTargetMethod(String callId,
                    Class<?> targetType,
                    String methodName)
        Calls target method of the service by specific protocol.
        Parameters:
        callId - the unique call ID
        targetType - the class of target service
        methodName - the name of calling method on target service
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - when error occurs during calling target method
